text:
anchiootorenal/branchiootic syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to branchiootorenal/branchiootic syndrome ?,"Mutations in three genes, EYA1, SIX1, and SIX5, have been reported in people with BOR/BO syndrome. About 40 percent of people with this condition have a mutation in the EYA1 gene. SIX1 gene mutations are a much less common cause of the disorder.
